level.heading: Rules and regulations--Tax provisions.
level.text: Unless otherwise provided, the Mayor shall prescribe such rules and regulations as the Mayor deems necessary to carry out the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-131, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1801.04.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority under Law 5-32, see Mayor's Order 83-268, November 16, 1983.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Mayor authorized to issue rules and regulations: Section 201 of D.C. Law 4-118 provided that the "Mayor may prescribe such rules and regulations as the Mayor deems necessary to carry out the provisions of the District of Columbia Individuals, Estates, and Trusts Federal Conformity Tax Act of 1982."
Mayor authorized to issue rules and regulations: Section 9 of D.C. Law 5-32 provided that the Mayor shall issue regulations necessary to carry out the provisions of the act.
